channel.title: Massables Spec
channel.description:
How do i remove the Mass able spec like u can do it 4 times In like 1-3 sec's..Action timers are high at mines Nothing works :( Plzz tell me
And if you know to make it so u run to the people when you do spec..I will rep you :)

item.title: Massables Spec
item.dc:creator: @zez1ma_boy zez1ma boy
item.description:
@zez1ma_boy wrote:

try this public void DDSSpecial() { if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && actionTimer == 0) { actionTimer = 20; staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100); setAnimation(0x426); actionTimer = 4; SpecDamgNPC(30); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; actionAmount++; AnimationReset = true; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecDamgNPC(30); SpecialDelay -= 5; } else if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && actionTimer == 0 && (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy || PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy2) || (duelStatus == 3)) { int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; actionTimer = 20; SpecDamg(30); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100); startAnimation(0x426); actionTimer = 4; actionAmount++; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecialDelay -= 3; } else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 5 && !DDS) DDS = true; else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 5 && DDS) DDS = false; else { sendMessage("You dont have enough power."); } getFilling(); }

Read full topic

item.title: Massables Spec
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Try this?

public void DDSSpecial() { if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && actionTimer == 0) { actionTimer = 20; staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100); setAnimation(0x426); actionTimer = 4; SpecDamgNPC(30); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; actionAmount++; AnimationReset = true; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecDamgNPC(30); SpecialDelay -= 3; } else if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && actionTimer == 0 && (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy || PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy2) || (duelStatus == 3)) { int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; actionTimer = 20; SpecDamg(30); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100); startAnimation(0x426); actionTimer = 4; actionAmount++; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecialDelay -= 3; } else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && !DDS) DDS = true; else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && DDS) DDS = false; else { sendMessage("You dont have enough power."); } getFilling(); }

item.title: Massables Spec
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

I’ve got a different 1,

public void DDSSpecial()
    {
        if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2)
        {
            staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100);
            setAnimation(0x426);
            actionTimer = 4;
            SpecDamgNPC(30);
	    DDS2Damg = true;
	    DDStimer = 1;
	    actionAmount++;
	    AnimationReset = true;
            teleportToX = absX;
            teleportToY = absY;
            SpecDamgNPC(30);
	    SpecialDelay -= 3;
        } else
        if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy || PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy2) || (duelStatus == 3))
        {
            int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
            int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
            int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
            SpecDamg(30);
	    DDS2Damg = true;
	    DDStimer = 1;
	    staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100);
            startAnimation(0x426);
            actionTimer = 4;
            actionAmount++;
            teleportToX = absX;
            teleportToY = absY;
            SpecialDelay -= 3;
        } else
        if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && !DDS)
            DDS = true;
        else
        if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && DDS)
            DDS = false;
        else {
            sendMessage("You dont have enough power."); }
		getFilling();
    }

Read full topic

item.title: Massables Spec
item.dc:creator: @_J_O_H_N [-J O H N-]
item.description:
@_J_O_H_N wrote:

public void DDSSpecial() { if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) { setAnimation(0x426); actionTimer = 4; SpecDamgNPC(25); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; resetAnimation(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecDamgNPC(25); SpecialDelay -= 5; }

Change the delay to about 5 and it should work. In client.java look for the piece of code I posted.

Read full topic
